VA2703-LED Widescreen LCD Monitor
Marketing Information:
ViewSonic's VA2703-LED is a 27" widescreen LED display featuring Full HD 1080p resolution for a crisp, full-motion video experience. Exclusive ClearMotiv II imaging technology and high 10,000,000 : 1 dynamic contrast ratio make images smooth and colors vibrant. With a 16:9 aspect ratio, the display's large viewing area greatly enhances productivity when working on large spreadsheets or using multiple applications. The environmentally friendly VA2703-LED saves energy and money through ECO Mode, which reduces power consumption and extends backlight life. VA2703-LED provides great value and is an excellent visual solution for homes and businesses.
